name: Bible X - Demo
description:
It’s the year 2072. Everything you believe in is being challenged. Are you willing to risk it all to discover the truth?

One dauntless man named Hector is on a mission. His time machine, Elijah, is ready to take you on the adventure of your life.

Explore ancient Jerusalem

Join a team of dauntless adventurers and travel through time to the vibrant world of 1st century Jerusalem. See the glory of Herod's temple and experience the magic of places like the Mount of Olives, the Garden of Gethsemane, the charismatic Lower City, the bustling markets, and more.

Solve quests, dodge enemies, help the locals

Experience the reality of a world on the brink of upheaval as you interact with history and get involved in the events that are unfolding. Rub elbows with familiar people and help the locals, all while avoiding the Roman soldiers swarming the city. When in danger, use your gear to get out of sticky situations.

Gather a team for CoPlay

Every quest, escape, and puzzle take on a new dimension when friends join the fun! Play solo or together with up to 6 players in a unique, cross-platform co-op experience.

Experience the Bible and grow in faith

See history with new eyes as you live through it personally. All that you experience in this life-changing place and time will give you knowledge, understanding, and confidence to take back with you to save the future.

This early demo is created exclusively as proof of concept. We plan to continue updating this demo as we refine the core elements of our game.

We value your feedback highly and appreciate it if you can fill in our survey when you are done. Feel free to record your gameplay if you like and share it with us!

Have fun playing!

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

MINIMUM

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660s / AMD RX VEGA 56
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit

RECOMMENDED

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or better
  • Storage: SSD

Ensure graphic drivers are updated to experience optimal quality

Interested in following our game dev journey? Join our mailing list!

Find out more about us and read our devlog here: https://biblex.io/
